hero.subtitle: Tarion blends AI Tarot spreads, the destiny matrix, and a practitioners’ community. Experts and algorithms — side by side to highlight your next step.

one.title: Step 1
one.body: Formulate a question or pick a spread template.

two.title: Step 2
two.body: AI draws cards and connects meanings to your situation.

three.title: Step 3
three.body: Add your interpretation and ask follow-up questions.

community.title: Tarion Community
community.text: 1,200+ members try spreads and share feedback

deck.note: Demo deck and offline inference for preview

forum_page.pending_banner: The thread has been sent for moderation. It will appear after approval.
forum_page.author: Author
forum_page.api_hint: (only approved threads are shown in the list)

palm.title: Palm Predictions (AI)
palm.lead_html: Upload 2–{{max}} photos: left and right palm, optionally — a close-up of lines. We will highlight the main lines and prepare interpretations.

upload.hint: JPG/PNG · up to {{maxSize}} MB each · {{minFiles}}–{{maxFiles}} photos
upload.min_req: Minimum — {{min}} photos (left and right palm). We recommend adding a close-up of the main lines.

state.usually_seconds: This usually takes a few seconds.

auth.required_palm_desc: Palm analysis is available only to authorized users.

how.title: How to take proper photos
how.1: Shoot in diffused daylight, no flash or strong glare.
how.2: Wash and dry your hands, remove rings/bracelets.
how.3: Take photos of the left and right palm, fingers relaxed and slightly open.
how.4: Hold the camera perpendicular; add a 3rd photo — a close-up of the lines.
how.5: JPG/PNG, width ≥ 1000 px, size up to {{max}} MB.

vd.title: Virtual Tarot Deck
vd.subtitle: Shuffle, draw, and lay out tarot cards right in your browser — for quick practice, demos, and full readings.

sidebar.title: Card meanings
sidebar.empty: No cards on the table yet.

help.title: How to use the virtual deck
help.quota_note: You've reached your free weekly limit. Upgrade your plan to keep drawing cards.

actions.single_click: Single click on a card: flip it (show/hide face).
actions.double_click: Double-click on a card: zoom in; click outside to return.
actions.sidebar_click: Click an item in the right sidebar: select the card and flip it with animation.
actions.sidebar_zoom: Click the magnifier next to a card in the sidebar: open zoom (same as double-click).
actions.ai_button: Press “Get AI interpretation” to generate a reading based on opened cards.

icons.take: Draw a card from the deck.
icons.undo: Undo the last drawn card (return it to the deck).
icons.shuffle: Shuffle the remaining cards in the deck.

auth.title: Log in to use the Virtual Deck
auth.desc: This feature is available to authorized users only.

footer.rights: All rights reserved. Use of materials is allowed only with written permission.
